body: At 3rd level, a sandman gains a +1 bonus on Reflex saves against traps and a +1 dodge bonus to AC against traps. These bonuses increase by +1 every three levels after 3rd. This ability replaces inspire competence.
name: Trap Sense
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Bard/Bard Archetypes/Sandman/Trap Sense
